text: Paul Dijoud (born 25 June 1938) is a Monegasque politician. He was the 18th Minister of State of Monaco from 1994 to 1997.Monaco; Worldstatesmen Dijoud was born in Neuilly-sur-Seine. He was French ambassador to Colombia (1988–1991), Mexico (1992–1994) and Argentina (1997–2003). title: Paul Dijoud
